summary: This is a New York State criminal history record check response from the Division of Criminal Justice Services, indicating no criminal history found for the individual associated with the provided NYSID. The document includes standard disclaimers about fingerprint verification and FBI records.

persons.name: Michael C. Green
persons.role: Executive Deputy Commissioner of the NYS Division of Criminal Justice Services
persons.context: Listed as the executive deputy commissioner of the agency issuing the criminal history record.

events.title: Criminal History Record Inquiry
events.description: A criminal history record check was conducted by the New York State Division of Criminal Justice Services for an individual identified by a NYSID.

locations.name: Alfred E. Smith Building
locations.address: 80 South Swan St., Albany, New York 12210
locations.context: Location of the New York State Division of Criminal Justice Services.

locations.name: Albany, New York
locations.context: City where the Division of Criminal Justice Services is located.

keyFacts: The document is a response to a criminal history record inquiry conducted on October 6, 2021.
No New York State criminal history was found for the individual associated with the queried NYSID.
The record includes a caution that identification was not based on fingerprint comparison.
The document notes that the absence of a record in the NYS system does not preclude the FBI from having a record.
Standard legal warnings about unauthorized dissemination of the information are included, citing federal law Title 42 USC 3789g(b).
